job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: 1Should be good in React amp Angularltbrgt2 Should have good experience in Azure blob servicebus queue app service function appsltbrgt3 Should be good at Net  C codingltbrgt4 Full stack developer ltbrgt5 510 years of SDE experienceltbrgtltbrgt 18 Month Contract with Microsoftltbrgt PTO Includedltbrgt Health Insurance Available ltbrgtltbrgtWhat makes this role interesting Ecommerce continues to be one of the fastest growing and exciting areas of technology in both Consumer and Commercial channels The Cloud amp Enterprise Omnichannel team owns delivery of highlyscalable services to enable the sale and fulfillment of 1st and 3rd party hardware and devices through digital and physical storefronts as well as the connection to 3rd party retailers Our vision is to deliver radical customer delight at high margins for hardware through manufacturing agility fulfillment flexibility and world class device care We are looking for senior developers to help us modernize customer device experiences after purchase You will work on initiatives across device lifecycle management expansion of the device repair ecosystem developing new device value added services device subscription models and other Reverse LogisticsCare capabilitiesltbrgt
